'''[[Structs:Screen|Screen]]'''
native static int '''GetWidth'''()
== Usage == Gets the width of the screen. Note that this does not correspond to the view port. [[GetViewWindow]] should be used if getting the width of the view port is desired. This will take forced aspect ratios into account (e.g. it will return the width of the display area and not the width of the game window).
=== Return value === Returns the real pixel width of the screen.
